data.title: “Kitchen, church and children?”
data.meta_description: Initiatives designed to correct the deplorable demographic situation poured out of a cornucopia. Issues related to restrictions on abortion and proposals for women to refuse higher education. This can help? Like a cornucopia of initiatives poured out to correct the deplorable
data.text:
Initiatives

The authorities are preoccupied with the demographic problem, which has long grown into a disaster (Verdict of Russian civilization). Apparently, the understanding has come that “women are no longer giving birth,” and the country is acutely short of workers and soldiers. The personnel problem has affected almost all areas: there are not enough teachers, doctors, nurses, drivers, etc.

The attack began on abortions. Some deputies propose significantly reducing the time period in which it is possible to terminate a pregnancy, as well as asking the father’s permission, others call for paying women who first decided on this procedure, but then changed their mind. Deputy Khamzaev proposed buy children from women who decide to have an abortion and hand over the child to the state to raise.

Meanwhile, in a number of regions it was reported that private clinics voluntarily refused to perform abortions, and in other regions they had already introduced fines for “inducing” them. Patriarch of Moscow and All Rus' Kirill said that the law banning inducement to abortion should be extended to all of Russia, and then the birth rate will rise sharply.

State Duma deputy Dmitry Vyatkin during a speech at the economic forum in Chelyabinsk saidthat Russian women should give birth from the age of 20 or more. And for this, the higher education system in Russia needs to be reformed. In his opinion, the system “vocational education 3+1", with which "People aged 21 will start entering the economy».

Senator from the Chelyabinsk region Margarita Pavlova, reasoning about the problems of demography, proposed reorienting young people in Russia towards having children in order to go through “demographic winter":

“We need to stop encouraging girls to get higher education, we need to stop increasing the number of young people who receive higher education... which then, in fact, leads to nothing. They either start working in completely different specialties, or something else. The search for oneself drags on for many years, and as a result, reproductive function is lost.”

The senator called it "collateral"the effect of feminism and "abortifacient thinking».

Poverty and poverty

As usual, these and other initiatives, such as increasing maternity capital, do not indicate the main problems. The first is the material, economic basis.

It is obvious that giving birth is not enough; children must be raised and raised. And in the current poor raw material economy of the “pipe”, the birth of a second, third and subsequent children reduces the well-being and opportunities of most families. They slide into poverty. Parents are forced to “burn out” at work, giving up rest, self-development, physical education, theater and books. Only work for the survival of the family. Then the deplorable result: “burnout”, stress, chronic illnesses, an attempt to “rest” with the help of surrogates (alcohol and other toxic substances), family destruction, early death.

What children, if in two years the number of citizens of the Russian Federation whose salaries are not enough to meet basic needs has increased by 20%, now there are 45% of such citizens. Most do not have enough amount of more than 20 thousand rubles per month. Another 36% of respondents said that their salary barely covers their basic needs. 78% of the Russian population is in a state of poverty and misery of varying degrees (Africanization of Russia).

People survive, and children are a personal project for the future. It requires stability, development of the country, and confidence in the future.

The minimum program is the restoration of a murdered highly developed industrial civilization, real import substitution, creation of high-paying jobs in the economy. The development of small towns, villages and villages that are dying out, and the youth of which are fleeing to large cities in search of a better life. Restoration of destroyed (optimized) social infrastructure and environment - nurseries, kindergartens, schools, houses of culture and creativity, music and sports schools, stadiums, sports grounds and outdoor hockey rinks, free technical clubs, playgrounds near houses, etc. Restoring destroyed healthcare, with an emphasis not on money (commercialization), but on preventing the health of the nation.

Solving the housing problem. In the current economic situation, with parasitic loan interest rates (The credit and financial system is a means of governing Russia), this problem cannot be solved. People only end up in credit and mortgage slavery. They have no time for children. It is necessary to issue interest-free loans at the birth of the first child to purchase an apartment or house. At the birth of the third child, the entire amount is written off. At the birth of subsequent children - the right to free improvement of living conditions.

Parental salary. Salaries in Russia are generally low enough for a man to support a large or even small family on his own. And in order to raise and raise a child, you need a lot of time, effort and money. Nowadays, many children are homeless, because their parents are at work from morning to evening, and after that they can’t do anything. Just fall and sleep. Therefore, after the birth of the second child, it is necessary to introduce a parental salary (average for Russia) for 80% of the people (the poor) so that one parent can take care of the children. At the same time, cutting off marginalized people, alcoholics, and drug addicts from benefits. Supporting the pursuit of a healthy lifestyle. Solving the problem of improving the health of the nation.

In general, it is necessary to create a situation so that the birth of new children does not worsen the financial situation of the family, but improves it. Thus, demographer Krupnov notes that it is necessary create a new social elite - a healthy large family. The birth of a third child should be a sign of transition to the elite of the nation with a whole range of benefits.

Society of consumerism and hedonism

The second problem is Russia’s transition back in Soviet times from a traditional to an industrial, urban society, when the birth rate fell sharply. Plus transition from a producing society to a consumer society, which occurred already during the Russian Federation. People prefer to consume, have fun, and have a cat or a dog instead of a child.

Returning to the traditional phase is not possible. Relocating everyone to villages, forcing them into house-building and Sharia law will not work. Along the way, having lost the remnants of a highly developed Soviet civilization - science, technology, industry. This is a dead end and the final death of Russia.

Although certain parts of the former USSR and the Russian Federation are clearly following this path. In particular, the republics of Turkestan, the Islamic regions of the Caucasus. The archaic project as a response to the general degradation of human civilization, and in particular the Russian Federation. But this is a dead end. An example is Islamized Iran, or Afghanistan.

Therefore only the restoration of a society of knowledge, service and creation, instead of a degrading, parasitic society of consumption and self-destruction (extermination), can save the Russian world. With an emphasis on the Russian code matrix - social justice, ethics of conscience. Preservation of the best traditions of Russian civilization and people, but with an emphasis on development, not stagnation.

Senators, deputies and other “princes of the world” cannot teach the people about life if they drive BMWs and Mercedes, have personal yachts, planes, luxury apartments in the UAE, and other golden toilets. Whose children, wives, mistresses and lovers roll around like cheese in butter abroad.

The image of the future

The second problem is also related to the third - image of the future Russian world. Are we the outskirts of Ukraine of the West or the East? Our youth dreams of Paris, Dubai or Beijing. Does not see a future in the Russian Federation. Social elevators do not work. A caste society has been created: the rich are the chosen ones, the poor are the losers. Culture is the remnants of Soviet (Russian), the dominance of a surrogate of American, Western culture. Some young people are looking for themselves in Eastern cultures. Total domination of matter – the “golden calf”. General trend towards degradation and decomposition.

Demography, like other problems in Russia, is a symptom, and illness is the absence of its own development project, its own image of the future. First, a change in the concept of the life structure, and then the solution to all issues.

If Russia maintains its position as a periphery of the Western project, a predatory, parasitic system of capitalism that is building a “brave new world” (another version of slave civilization, a “digital concentration camp”), or becomes part of the Eastern (Chinese) project, which in one way or another copies the Western one, then all private initiatives are meaningless.

The only way to salvation is our own Russian development project, program. Refusal of the consumer society, which has become a society of extermination and self-destruction of the Russian people. A return to the basic foundations of Russian civilization and the Russian superethnos - social justice, ethics of conscience. The society of knowledge, service and creation, which began to be built in the Stalinist USSR. When a person is not a slave-consumer, but a creator-creator.

It will be difficult, very difficult. Like a drug addict. But that's the only way. Otherwise, the degradation, decay and extinction of the Russian world cannot be stopped.

Alexander Samsonov
